title: Could India Help Broker Peace in Ukraine?
description: India has good relations with both Russia and the West, and seeks a more muscular role in geopolitics. The biggest obstacle is that Ukrainians and Russians don’t want to talk.
dc:creator: Jeffrey Gettleman and Mujib Mashal
media:description: S. Jaishankar, India’s foreign minister, is traveling to Russia this week for meetings with Russian officials.
